p: Olea europaea L., is one of the most important and abundant crops in the Mediterranean basin. Mostly it is recognized for its olive fruits as well as for the oil derived from them [ 1, 2]. Considerable amounts of compounds with beneficial health properties are found in both olive fruits and oil, with olive oil being particularly valued as an indispensable part of Mediterranean diet, a healthy balanced diet associated with disease prevention and health maintenance [ 3, 4, 5, 6].
